issue.title: [CI] Add automatic PR label for docs PRs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16780](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16780). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Our auto-labeller for PRs supports adding several labels to Github PRs based on the files modified in the PR. It misses a label for doc changes, though.

See `.github/workflows/dev_pr/labeler.yml` for the implementation.
